CustomField.description: Defines if an Leave will be excluded from Bulk Alternative Approver Reminder listings. When TRUE the Leave will be excluded from Bulk Alternative Approver Reminders. Reminders can only be send on the individual basis via the Leaves
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines if an Leave will be excluded from Bulk Alternative Approver Reminder listings. When TRUE the Leave will be excluded from Bulk Alternative Approver Reminders. Reminders can only be send on the individual basis via the Leaves
CustomField.label: Exclude From Alternative Appr Remin List
